unit.creator: Philodemus || Ranocchia, Graziano et Vassallo, Christian
unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 76 PHerc. 1004 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ]ϲαι +1 sub lineam vert. apicata, inf. vert., inf. arcus 2 ]μφερει +1 3 ̣[ ̣₍ ̣₎] ̣[ inf. duo arcus se tangentes, (π, η, γ, ι) ]ρωϲ[]θειν +1 sup. horiz., sup. horiz., sin. sup. arcus, sup. vert. et inf. vest. 4 ε̣ ̣[ dext. arcus ]γω[]διδο +1 desc. vel arcus 5 ̣[ (μ, ν) ]επιθυμε +1 inf. vert. 6 ]εμιμι +1 vert., dext. sup. horiz. apicata, (η, κ, ν), (ε, ϲ) 7  ̣[ (δ, β), (ο, ω, c) ]υμφερει +1 8 ̣αχα ̣α inf. vert. cum horiz. coniuncta, (γ, τ, ι) ]ϲιμον +1 9 ̣αιτη̣ ̣ε inf. vert., inf. vert., (ϲ, ε, ξ) αυτωι +1 10 ̣ι (τ, π) ]ονε +1 11 ε[ (γ, π) ]τουϲε +1 (ρ, β) 12 υμ +1 13 ρ̣ ̣ ̣π̣ (ε, c, ο, θ), inf. vert. ]ρ +1 (ε, η) 14 θ ̣ν̣ (η, κ, γ, π, ι, ν) ϲο +1 (υ, κ), sup. vest. 15 ο̣ ̣ ̣ν (ν, π, γι, ιτ), dext. arcus υνα +1 16 ⟦φ⟧ del. librarius ⸌ι⸍ supra lineam addito ]υc ̣[ (ο, ε, ϲ), (η, χ) ]κα +1 17 ] ̣ ̣ ̣γχ̣ ̣[ (κ, χ, ϲ), (ε, ϲ), med. vest., (κ, ν, ε), (ο, ε, θ) ]ει +1 (π, γ, τ) 18-20 +1 21 ]η +1 (κ, η), dext. inf. horiz. vel desc.
